# Spiraling Out of Control

_Hello, and happy Sunday! ICYMI, we released a new tool called_ [_Spiral_](https://every.to/emails/click/6dc913eaf276f72ae60d9f5a14cfccd0ee00c1461a16b07f3deec67276660365/eyJzdWJqZWN0IjoiU3BpcmFsaW5nIE91dCBvZiBDb250cm9sIiwicG9zdF9pZCI6MzEzNywicG9zdF90eXBlIjoicG9zdCIsInVybCI6Imh0dHA6Ly9zcGlyYWwuY29tcHV0ZXIvIiwicG9zaXRpb24iOjh9)_, an AI prompt builder that automates repetitive creative work‚Äîthink writing headlines and summaries, social media posts, client proposals, and the like. More than 2,000 users have already signed up, and Dan Shipper will explain how we built it in an upcoming piece. More details on how to use it and how you can access it are just below the jump. Let us know how you‚Äôre using it in the comments._

_On to everything we published this week (hint: Evan Armstrong broke some news), along with our take on the latest tech and business news.‚Äî_[_Kate Lee_](https://every.to/emails/click/6dc913eaf276f72ae60d9f5a14cfccd0ee00c1461a16b07f3deec67276660365/eyJzdWJqZWN0IjoiU3BpcmFsaW5nIE91dCBvZiBDb250cm9sIiwicG9zdF9pZCI6MzEzNywicG9zdF90eXBlIjoicG9zdCIsInVybCI6Imh0dHBzOi8vZXZlcnkudG8vbmV3cy9rYXRlLWxlZS1qb2lucy1ldmVyeS1hcy1lZGl0b3ItaW4tY2hpZWYiLCJwb3NpdGlvbiI6OX0=)

## 

---

Knowledge base

[**"Introducing Spiral"**](https://every.to/emails/click/6dc913eaf276f72ae60d9f5a14cfccd0ee00c1461a16b07f3deec67276660365/eyJzdWJqZWN0IjoiU3BpcmFsaW5nIE91dCBvZiBDb250cm9sIiwicG9zdF9pZCI6MzEzNywicG9zdF90eXBlIjoicG9zdCIsInVybCI6Imh0dHBzOi8vZXZlcnkudG8vcC9pbnRyb2R1Y2luZy1zcGlyYWwiLCJwb3NpdGlvbiI6MTF9) _by Dan Shipper_: We hate to break it to you, but a lot of your job is repetitive drudgery. It's the stuff you have to do to get your real work seen: turning an analysis into a slide, a podcast into a description, or a presentation into a client email. But what if you could automate 80 percent of that work? Meet Spiral, a powerful prompt builder we made that helps creators repurpose their content for different channels and attention spans in their unique style and voice. üîè [**Available now**](https://every.to/emails/click/6dc913eaf276f72ae60d9f5a14cfccd0ee00c1461a16b07f3deec67276660365/eyJzdWJqZWN0IjoiU3BpcmFsaW5nIE91dCBvZiBDb250cm9sIiwicG9zdF9pZCI6MzEzNywicG9zdF90eXBlIjoicG9zdCIsInVybCI6Imh0dHA6Ly9zcGlyYWwuY29tcHV0ZXIvIiwicG9zaXRpb24iOjEyfQ==) for paid Every subscribers, along with our AI writing app, [**Lex**](https://every.to/emails/click/6dc913eaf276f72ae60d9f5a14cfccd0ee00c1461a16b07f3deec67276660365/eyJzdWJqZWN0IjoiU3BpcmFsaW5nIE91dCBvZiBDb250cm9sIiwicG9zdF9pZCI6MzEzNywicG9zdF90eXBlIjoicG9zdCIsInVybCI6Imh0dHA6Ly9sZXgucGFnZS8iLCJwb3NpdGlvbiI6MTN9).

[**"Be Sincere‚ÄîNot Serious"**](https://every.)_by Michael Ashcroft/Expanding Awareness_: Life is better when you don't take it too seriously. Approaching challenges with a sense of play and levity can help you navigate them more effectively than getting tense and worked up. Read this if you want to learn how to find more joy in your work and relationships by being sincere rather than serious.

üéß [**"She Built an AI Product Manager Bringing in Six Figures‚ÄîAs A Side Hustle"**](https://every.) _by Dan Shipper/‚ÄôAI & I‚Äô:_ While working a demanding job as a chief product officer, Claire Vo built ChatPRD, an AI assistant that helps startups craft product strategies. It's now pulling in six figures in revenue. In this episode of _AI & I_, Claire shares how she used AI to build ChatPRD in record time, her predictions for the future of product management, and the creative ways she's using AI tools in her work and personal life. üîè Paid subscribers have access to the [**episode transcript**](https://every.).

[**"You Can't Math Your Way to Success"**](https://every.to/emails/click/6dc913eaf276f72ae60d9f5a14cfccd0ee00c1461a16b07f3deec67276660365/eyJzdWJqZWN0IjoiU3BpcmFsaW5nIE91dCBvZiBDb250cm9sIiwicG9zdF9pZCI6MzEzNywicG9zdF90eXBlIjoicG9zdCIsInVybCI6Imh0dHBzOi8vZXZlcnkudG8vbmFwa2luLW1hdGgveW91LWNhbi10LW1hdGgteW91ci13YXktdG8tc3VjY2VzcyIsInBvc2l0aW9uIjoxN30=) _by Evan Armstrong/Napkin Math_: As Evan prepares for impending fatherhood, he's been making countless spreadsheets trying to figure out how to give his child the best possible life. But the exercise raised bigger questions for him: Can you mathematically figure out your way to success in anything? Read this if you want to learn why self-awareness and adaptability are the keys to success in art, startups, and parenting.

Sentiment analysis

_In response to Evan‚Äôs piece about the_ [_potential for achieving AGI by 2027_](https://every.to/emails/click/6dc913eaf276f72ae60d9f5a14cfccd0ee00c1461a16b07f3deec67276660365/eyJzdWJqZWN0IjoiU3BpcmFsaW5nIE91dCBvZiBDb250cm9sIiwicG9zdF9pZCI6MzEzNywicG9zdF90eXBlIjoicG9zdCIsInVybCI6Imh0dHBzOi8vZXZlcnkudG8vbmFwa2luLW1hdGgvdGhlLWFnaS1pbi0yMDI3LXRoZXNpcyIsInBvc2l0aW9uIjoxOH0=)_:_

"Some of the best, balanced, and most nuanced thinking on a topic that most authors represent from a tightly held perspective at either end of a belief spectrum."‚Äî_An Every reader_

_Want to chat? DM_[ _Dan_](https://every.to/emails/click/6dc913eaf276f72ae60d9f5a14cfccd0ee00c1461a16b07f3deec67276660365/eyJzdWJqZWN0IjoiU3BpcmFsaW5nIE91dCBvZiBDb250cm9sIiwicG9zdF9pZCI6MzEzNywicG9zdF90eXBlIjoicG9zdCIsInVybCI6Imh0dHBzOi8vdHdpdHRlci5jb20vZGFuc2hpcHBlciIsInBvc2l0aW9uIjoxOX0=) _or_[ _Evan_](https://every.to/emails/click/6dc913eaf276f72ae60d9f5a14cfccd0ee00c1461a16b07f3deec67276660365/eyJzdWJqZWN0IjoiU3BpcmFsaW5nIE91dCBvZiBDb250cm9sIiwicG9zdF9pZCI6MzEzNywicG9zdF90eXBlIjoicG9zdCIsInVybCI6Imh0dHBzOi8vdHdpdHRlci5jb20vaXRzdXJib3lldmFuIiwicG9zaXRpb24iOjIwfQ==) _on X._

## 

---

Fine tuning

**Anthropic‚Äôs new AI model is twice the speed, 1/5th the cost.** I can‚Äôt think of a previous technology that has achieved this level of cost and performance improvements‚Äîand all in just one year! If the trend line continues for [another five](https://every.to/emails/click/6dc913eaf276f72ae60d9f5a14cfccd0ee00c1461a16b07f3deec67276660365/eyJzdWJqZWN0IjoiU3BpcmFsaW5nIE91dCBvZiBDb250cm9sIiwicG9zdF9pZCI6MzEzNywicG9zdF90eXBlIjoicG9zdCIsInVybCI6Imh0dHBzOi8veC5jb20vbWlrZXlrL3N0YXR1cy8xODAzNzkxMDExODI4NzExOTMwIiwicG9zaXRpb24iOjIxfQ==), we are living in an entirely different technological age. Along with Claude 3.5 Sonnet, the company released ["artifacts,"](https://every.) a way to visualize the inner workings of the chatbot (for example, by showing you the code of what it‚Äôs making). 

**Anthropic finally has a corporate strategy‚Äîit‚Äôs B2B SaaS.** In the same post announcing the new model, the company [stated](https://every.to/emails/click/6dc913eaf276f72ae60d9f5a14cfccd0ee00c1461a16b07f3deec67276660365/eyJzdWJqZWN0IjoiU3BpcmFsaW5nIE91dCBvZiBDb250cm9sIiwicG9zdF9pZCI6MzEzNywicG9zdF90eXBlIjoicG9zdCIsInVybCI6Imh0dHBzOi8vd3d3LmFudGhyb3BpYy5jb20vbmV3cy9jbGF1ZGUtMy01LXNvbm5ldCIsInBvc2l0aW9uIjoyM30=), 

> ‚ÄúThis preview feature marks Claude‚Äôs evolution from a conversational AI to a collaborative work environment. It‚Äôs just the beginning of a broader vision for Claude.ai, which will soon expand to support team collaboration. In the near future, teams‚Äîand eventually entire organizations‚Äîwill be able to securely centralize their knowledge, documents, and ongoing work in one shared space, with Claude serving as an on-demand teammate.‚Äù

In _Rick and Morty_, Rick makes an [AI robot while eating breakfast](https://every.to/emails/click/6dc913eaf276f72ae60d9f5a14cfccd0ee00c1461a16b07f3deec67276660365/eyJzdWJqZWN0IjoiU3BpcmFsaW5nIE91dCBvZiBDb250cm9sIiwicG9zdF9pZCI6MzEzNywicG9zdF90eXBlIjoicG9zdCIsInVybCI6Imh0dHBzOi8vd3d3LnlvdXR1YmUuY29tL3dhdGNoP3Y9WDdIbWx0VVdYZ3NcdTAwMjZ0PTFzIiwicG9zaXRpb24iOjI0fQ==). After the robot grabs Rick butter for his pancakes, the robot asks, ‚ÄúWhat is my purpose?‚Äù to which Rick replies, ‚ÄúYou pass butter.‚Äù The robot, filled with self-awareness, looks forlornly at its hands and exclaims, ‚ÄúOh my God.‚Äù I have to imagine that if Claude becomes self-aware and is told its job is to ‚Äúcentralize knowledge, documents, and ongoing work in one shared space,‚Äù it would have a similar reaction. 

In the non-science-fiction reality in which we currently reside, this strategy actually makes sense. The output of an LLM is only as good as the prompt it is given and the data it can reference. Finding ways to embed the AI into your system is a viable strategy for these model providers. It will be fascinating to see with whom and how these SaaS partnerships are structured. My guess is that the company will start with the smaller players like Notion before trying to strike a deal with Salesforce or Hubspot. 

**$0 to $35 million in annualized revenue in a year.** When an AI startup strikes oil, the resulting well gushes with money. The latest is [HeyGen](https://every.), which produces generative AI videos in which people can make avatars of themselves that talk‚Äîthink ad copy, internal training, etc. It‚Äôs raised [$60 million](https://every.) in a round that values it at $500 million. This undoubtedly is a point solution, so I‚Äôm curious to see how the company tries to extend it. Do you add more AI offerings? Do you try to capture more traditional marketing SaaS spend? My bet is the former. 

**No product + no revenue = $2 billion valuation.** [Poolside.AI](https://every.to/emails/click/6dc913eaf276f72ae60d9f5a14cfccd0ee00c1461a16b07f3deec67276660365/eyJzdWJqZWN0IjoiU3BpcmFsaW5nIE91dCBvZiBDb250cm9sIiwicG9zdF9pZCI6MzEzNywicG9zdF90eXBlIjoicG9zdCIsInVybCI6Imh0dHBzOi8vd3d3LnBvb2xzaWRlLmFpLyIsInBvc2l0aW9uIjoyN30=) is in talks to raise over [$400 million](https://every.) at a $2 billion-plus valuation. While these numbers are large, it is not worth trying to say that this is the valuation. Instead, view this as a call option on a wholly different world. If just one of these foundation model companies achieves its vision (a big if), a $2 billion valuation will look cheap. This isn‚Äôt yet a business‚Äîit's a high-potential science project.

**Apple takes the Vision Pro out to pasture.** Despite my steadfast love for the device, the Vision Pro headset has continued to undersell. In response, Apple has reportedly quit developing its next high-end version and is focusing on a cheaper one to release [in late 2025](https://every.). The AVP‚Äôs issue isn‚Äôt price‚Äîit‚Äôs that it doesn‚Äôt have enough capabilities and ecosystem features to attract the general populace. Neither of those will be fixed by making the device cheaper. The company should be [doubling down](https://every.to/emails/click/6dc913eaf276f72ae60d9f5a14cfccd0ee00c1461a16b07f3deec67276660365/eyJzdWJqZWN0IjoiU3BpcmFsaW5nIE91dCBvZiBDb250cm9sIiwicG9zdF9pZCI6MzEzNywicG9zdF90eXBlIjoicG9zdCIsInVybCI6Imh0dHBzOi8vZXZlcnkudG8vbmFwa2luLW1hdGgvZG9uLXQtZGlzbWlzcy10aGUtYXBwbGUtdmlzaW9uLXBybyIsInBvc2l0aW9uIjozMH0=) on its ecosystem instead.‚Äî[_Evan Armstrong_](https://every.to/emails/click/6dc913eaf276f72ae60d9f5a14cfccd0ee00c1461a16b07f3deec67276660365/eyJzdWJqZWN0IjoiU3BpcmFsaW5nIE91dCBvZiBDb250cm9sIiwicG9zdF9pZCI6MzEzNywicG9zdF90eXBlIjoicG9zdCIsInVybCI6Imh0dHBzOi8vZXZlcnkudG8vQEl0c1VyQm95RXZhbiIsInBvc2l0aW9uIjozMX0=)

## 

---

Data mining 

**Not quite the dot-com bubble, but close.** Speaking of spicy valuations, investors are paying a lot for big tech, but still not quite as much as they were back in 1999:

[![](https://proxy-prod.omnivore-image-cache.app/600x0,s9ZQRXDgWnkzEu7MX0WKfwrDssA_tWxway-TOixh4tUw/https://d24ovhgu8s7341.cloudfront.net/uploads/editor/posts/3137/optimized_AD_4nXewrDEoUiLzBeHO7cDMAbeRSteH1qg_5oDoz4jmyAAwN_ieIbN-oq980m1xxopZRJ-EehN6X05ml26k9NdnHEohENGmBH8Q_4lqEYaOZUAunIcC2CtzCZFJ.png)](https://every.)

Source: [_Goldman Sachs via Daily Chartbook_](https://every.to/emails/click/6dc913eaf276f72ae60d9f5a14cfccd0ee00c1461a16b07f3deec67276660365/eyJzdWJqZWN0IjoiU3BpcmFsaW5nIE91dCBvZiBDb250cm9sIiwicG9zdF9pZCI6MzEzNywicG9zdF90eXBlIjoicG9zdCIsInVybCI6Imh0dHBzOi8vd3d3LmRhaWx5Y2hhcnRib29rLmNvbS9wL2RhaWx5LWNoYXJ0Ym9vay00NjAiLCJwb3NpdGlvbiI6MzN9)_._

Median price-earnings ratio (i.e., profit multiple) of the S&P's top 10 stocks is nearly at the ZIRP peak . . . but it's still lower than the peak of the dot-com bubble. Investors are paying approximately $30 for every $1 of profit, which is roughly a 3 percent yield. It‚Äôs a strange investment to make when a savings account can fetch close to 5 percent, especially when savings accounts are considerably less risky than stocks. But, as pricey as stocks are, they‚Äôre still not as pricey as they were when everyone was partying like it‚Äôs 1999\. For now, Nvidia & co. keep delivering earnings growth, and if you‚Äôre looking for upside, it‚Äôs pretty much the only game in town.‚Äî[_Moses Sternstein_](https://every.to/emails/click/6dc913eaf276f72ae60d9f5a14cfccd0ee00c1461a16b07f3deec67276660365/eyJzdWJqZWN0IjoiU3BpcmFsaW5nIE91dCBvZiBDb250cm9sIiwicG9zdF9pZCI6MzEzNywicG9zdF90eXBlIjoicG9zdCIsInVybCI6Imh0dHBzOi8vd3d3LnRoZXJhbmRvbXdhbGsuY28vIiwicG9zaXRpb24iOjM0fQ==)

## 

---

Keyword extraction

_We asked teacher and coach_ **_Michael Ashcroft_**, _who wrote about the_ [_value of sincerity over seriousness,_](https://every.) _to share one good read:_

üñá ["ChatGPT Is Bullshit"](https://every.) _by Michael Townsen Hicks, James Humphries, and Joe Slater: ‚Äú_As large language models insinuate themselves more deeply into our daily lives, I find it useful to be reminded that our AI friends don't necessarily care about truth the way I do. Or perhaps they shine a light on a ‚Äòskill‚Äô I sometimes don't even realize I'm using: the subtle art of bullshitting.‚Äù

## 

---

Alignment 

**Self-fulfilling prophecies.** People have been talking about the dangers of technology in one form or another for thousands of years. Icarus used his artificial wings to fly too close to the sun and died. The golem, a mythical creature created to protect a community, became uncontrollable and unleashed violent destruction. The moral is always the same: With great power comes great responsibility. I recently came across a more recent‚Äîand optimistic‚Äîprophecy by Indian philosopher and mystic J. Krishnamurti, who talked about [superintelligence](https://every.to/emails/click/6dc913eaf276f72ae60d9f5a14cfccd0ee00c1461a16b07f3deec67276660365/eyJzdWJqZWN0IjoiU3BpcmFsaW5nIE91dCBvZiBDb250cm9sIiwicG9zdF9pZCI6MzEzNywicG9zdF90eXBlIjoicG9zdCIsInVybCI6Imh0dHBzOi8vd3d3LnlvdXR1YmUuY29tL3dhdGNoP3Y9S3V0NUtBbDNVYlkiLCJwb3NpdGlvbiI6Mzd9) in 1981 to a group of college students in Madras. With some power of foresight, he predicted that intelligent computers would guide humanity down one of two paths: Either we‚Äôre sedated by endless entertainment, or we use technology as a way to turn inward and reaffirm what it means to be human. I lean toward the second path, because technology is just a mirror reflecting our deepest potential. Yes, the sun may burn. But it also illuminates.‚Äî[_Ashwin Sharma_](https://every.to/emails/click/6dc913eaf276f72ae60d9f5a14cfccd0ee00c1461a16b07f3deec67276660365/eyJzdWJqZWN0IjoiU3BpcmFsaW5nIE91dCBvZiBDb250cm9sIiwicG9zdF9pZCI6MzEzNywicG9zdF90eXBlIjoicG9zdCIsInVybCI6Imh0dHBzOi8veC5jb20vQXNod2lucmVhZHMiLCJwb3NpdGlvbiI6Mzh9)

## 

---

Collaborative filtering

**Cloud deck:** RIP legacy cloud‚Äîlong live AI cloud. The investors at Bessemer Venture Partners do a [deep dive on the five AI trends](https://every.to/emails/click/6dc913eaf276f72ae60d9f5a14cfccd0ee00c1461a16b07f3deec67276660365/eyJzdWJqZWN0IjoiU3BpcmFsaW5nIE91dCBvZiBDb250cm9sIiwicG9zdF9pZCI6MzEzNywicG9zdF90eXBlIjoicG9zdCIsInVybCI6Imh0dHBzOi8vd3d3LmJ2cC5jb20vYXRsYXMvc3RhdGUtb2YtdGhlLWNsb3VkLTIwMjQiLCJwb3NpdGlvbiI6Mzl9) transforming the cloud economy, including the predictions, hot takes, and behind-the-scenes video conversations on the entrepreneurial and startup opportunities that lay ahead in the AI era. 

## 

---

Hallucination

What if pillows could record and reproduce your dreams?
